name: Shtriga: Summer Camp
description: Capture the spirit of a dead witch before she claims another victim!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 512 MB MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 800 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 3 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 800 MB available space
